tasks.title: Set up Google Search Console indexing
tasks.blockedReason: Need JSON key file + Search Console owner permission
nathanSteps: Go to Google Cloud Console → IAM → Service Accounts
Create a new JSON key → download it
Send the JSON key file to Atlas (drop in atlas repo files/from-nathan/ or paste contents)
In Google Search Console → Settings → Users and permissions → Add user
Do this for both app.architecturehelper.com and cresoftware.tech
tasks.notes: Will enable automatic page indexing, sitemap submission, and crawl monitoring.

tasks.title: Add Hetzner API token to Atlas dashboard
tasks.blockedReason: Nathan needs to enter Hetzner credentials in the dashboard
nathanSteps: Go to https://console.hetzner.cloud → your project → Security → API Tokens
Find your server ID in the Hetzner Console URL (e.g. /servers/12345678)
Click ⚙️ next to the heartbeat status
tasks.notes: Stored only in your browser localStorage. Enables VPS reboot from dashboard.
